text: esa rabukum -ya bani 'israyyl- 'an yarhamakum baed antqamh 'iina tubtum waslhtm, wa'iin eudtum 'iilaa al'ifsad walzlm eudna 'iilaa eqabkm wmdhllatkm. wajaealna jahanam lakum walilkafirin eamat sjnana la khuruj minh abda. wafi hadhih alayat wama qblha, tahdhir lihadhih al'umat min aleamal balmeasy; lialaa ysybha mithl ma 'asab bani 'israyyl, fsnn allah wahidat la tabadul wala tghyr
